Uses of Package
com.chaining

  • Packages that use com.chaining 
    Package Description
    com.chaining  
    com.chaining.interfaces  
  • Classes in com.chaining used by com.chaining 
    Class and Description
    Chain
    a class that encapsulates chaining multiple operations to be invoked on an Object through chained sequence of operations, then you can get the Object finally through calling Chain.call()
    Collector
    a class that keeps collecting new items into a list then returns the new List on request
    Condition
    a function that will not execute the Consumer passed to the Condition.then(Consumer) until the Predicate passed to it returned true, else it will change nothing
    Guard
    start a Chain that executes crashing code safely, you should provide Guard.onErrorReturn(Function) or Guard.onErrorReturnItem(Object) to provide a fallback item if a crash occurred, or you can call Guard.onError(Consumer) to handle the Exception (if thrown) and finish the functions chain
    Optional
    a class that acts as an RxJava Maybe, but it returns back to the Chain if possible
  • Classes in com.chaining used by com.chaining.interfaces 
    Class and Description
    Chain
    a class that encapsulates chaining multiple operations to be invoked on an Object through chained sequence of operations, then you can get the Object finally through calling Chain.call()
    Collector
    a class that keeps collecting new items into a list then returns the new List on request
